author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: We left My Hero Academia: All’s Justice impressed with the fisticuffs, but also its dedication to building a world where you’re actively being a hero, not just punching something. Like fighting games themselves, being a superhero isn’t just about fights; the stuff between brawls matters, too.
title: My Hero Academia: All’s Justice Wants You to Be a Hero, Not Just a Fighter

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: With returning favorites, legends making their last bow, and some fresh shows on the horizon, here's a look at what's coming to Crunchyroll this fall.
title: What's Coming to Crunchyroll in the Fall Anime Season

author: Billy Givens
description: This unique edition of the Razer Kraken Kitty V2 headset is still sold out everywhere except eBay.
title: Razer's Gengar Version of the Kraken Kitty V2 Is Still Sold Out Everywhere Except eBay

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Green Man Gaming's PlayStation PC Autumn Sale is stacked with some excellent deals, including 50% off Returnal, 50% off The Last of Us Part I, and many more.
title: Save Big on PlayStation Games for PC in Green Man Gaming’s Autumn Sale

author: Eric Song
description: 2025 successor to the Alienware m16 laptop.
title: The Alienware 16X Aurora Laptop Boasts Premium Build Quality and Gaming Performance at a Great Price

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: A book deal worth reaping.
title: The New Hunger Games Box Set With Sunrise on the Reaping Just Dropped to Its Lowest Price Ever

author: Chris Reed
description: We got an exclusive look at an upcoming visual history of Mortal Kombat.
title: Exclusive Look at Mortal Kombat Flawless Victory: A Visual History of the Iconic Series

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: After playing the remake of Yakuza Kiwami 3 and the new Dark Ties companion story, we came away impressed by how much RGG Studio is trying to improve and expand on the original.
title: Yakuza Kiwami 3 and Dark Ties Bring Much-Needed Combat and Visual Upgrades

author: Eric Song
description: You can also play and charge simultaneously.
title: This $19 Iniu 20,000 Power Bank Quadruples Your Nintendo Switch 2 Play Time

author: Lloyd Coombes
description: MagicCon Atlanta revealed plenty about Magic: The Gathering's 2026 sets. From Marvel to Star Trek, here's the full schedule so far.
title: Everything Officially Confirmed for Magic: The Gathering in 2026

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Thief has always been about stealth in its purest form, meaning: steal as much loot as possible and don't get spotted, because if you do, you aren't physically powerful enough to kill almost anyone. And based on what I've played so far, Legacy of Shadow seems to get and fully embrace this as well as the VR medium itself.
title: Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow Translates the Soul of Thief to VR

author: Tom Phillips
description: IGN can exclusively reveal the Fortnite outfit for KPop Demon Hunters character Rumi.
title: EXCLUSIVE: Fortnite Reveals KPop Demon Hunters Rumi Outfit

author: Michael Peyton
description: The filmmaker says that screenwriters and actors will always be essential to his creative process, even if AI efficiencies are useful in making moves.
title: James Cameron: ‘I Don't Want an AI Model to Write My Scripts’

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: Spooky season and a Disney anime.
title: Everything Coming to Disney+ in October

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: IGN can reveal the new trailer and poster for the upcoming Family Guy: Hulu-Exclusive Halloween Special. "A Little Fright Music" will premiere October 6 on Hulu.
title: Family Guy: Exclusive Trailer and Poster for the Show's New Hulu Halloween Special

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: At Tokyo Game Show 2025, we had another chance to check out Pragmata, and to talk to the game's creators and learn some interesting stories from the game's development, including that Diana was once, among other things, a talking dog.
title: Pragmata's Early Concepts for Diana Included a Robot, Animals, and Even a Talking Dog

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Adventure Time: The Bubbline College Special #1 explores an alternate universe where Princess Bubblegum and Marceline are two college kids in love. Check out our exclusive preview.
title: Adventure Time: The Bubbline College Special #1 Explores a Princess Bubblegum and Marceline Romance

author: Eric Song
description: Double your Nintendo Switch 2 storage capacity for $36 or triple it for $66.
title: The Cheapest Nintendo Switch 2 MicroSDXC Express Memory Cards Are Back in Stock at Walmart

author: Robert Anderson
description: Save nearly 50% on four Legend of Zelda Amiibo at Amazon during the early Prime Day sales.
title: Amazon Has Discounted These Legend of Zelda Amiibo in an Early October Prime Day Deal

author: Tom Phillips
description: The director of Resident Evil Requiem has said Western players are more likely to choose the game's first-person option, after growing up on a diet of PC first-person shooters such as Doom.
title: Resident Evil Requiem Director Says Western Fans More Likely to Play in First-Person After Growing Up With FPS Games Like Doom

author: Lloyd Coombes
description: Magic's latest set for Marvel's Spider-Man only just launched, but there's a questionable discount on Play Booster Boxes already.
title: Amazon Has Discounted MTG Booster Boxes in Early Prime Day Deal, Including the New Spider-Man Set

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Netflix's upcoming animated series, Splinter Cell: Deathwatch, “follows the timeline and characters set by the mainline games.”
title: How Netflix’s Splinter Cell: Deathwatch Ties into the Video Games

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Preorders are now live for The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered Physical Deluxe Edition on PS5 and Xbox Series X. It's set to be released on October 13 with a list price of $39.99.
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered Physical Deluxe Edition Is Up for Preorder

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Halo Studios looks set to unveil more of what it’s been working on in October.
title: Halo Studios Teases 'Deep Dive' on What It's Been Working on at an October Panel 'You Won't Want to Miss'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Avalanche Studios has announced plans to lay off staff across its studios in Malmo and Stockholm, and close its office in Liverpool, impacting all of the company's UK staff.
title: Just One Month After Xbox's Contraband Cancelation, Developer Avalanche Announces Layoffs and UK Studio Closure Plans

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: When I got to play Jurassic World Evolution 3, I was most excited to see that it finally seems like a fully-fledged member of the Frontier flock, with the extremely deep customization and personalization features I've come to expect from the studio.
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3: The Final Preview

author: Will Judd
title: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Elite Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: SAG-AFTRA has issued a strongly worded statement in response to the emergence of Tilly Norwood, the AI-generated “actress” that has incensed Hollywood.
title: SAG-AFTRA Hits Out at Tilly Norwood, the AI-Generated 'Actress' That Has Enraged Hollywood

author: Tom Phillips
description: Minecraft has announced a major new game update, Mounts of Mayhem, that will be spearheaded by the addition of... the spear!
title: Minecraft Adding Spears for Players, But Also for Mounted Zombies

author: Scott Collura
description: Review: You’ll believe a dog can star in a horror movie with Good Boy, which makes the most of its high-concept approach of centering a haunted house story not on a man but on man’s best friend.
title: Good Boy Review

author: Lloyd Coombes
description: Final Fantasy's Magic: The Gathering Commander Decks are still dropping in price, and the Final Fantasy XIV offering is now cheaper than ever with this early Prime Day discount.
title: Magic's Final Fantasy Commander Decks Are Discounted Again Today, and Cheaper Than Ever

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Sony has confirmed the global release times for PS5 exclusive Ghost of Yotei. Here's when you'll be able to play in your timezone.
title: Ghost of Yotei Global Release Times Confirmed

author: Vikki Blake
description: Activision has confirmed the global release times for the Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Early Access Beta and Open Beta. Here's when you'll be able to play in your timezone.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Early Access Beta and Open Beta Global Release Times Confirmed

author: Robert Anderson
description: The Steam Autumn Sale is now live, running now through October 6 at 10 AM PT, and it is packed with discounts worth paying attention to.
title: Steam's Autumn Sale is Now Live, and We Found the Best Deals for 2025

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Activision has warned PC gamers that they will not be able to play Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 during the beta and at launch if they do not enable TPM 2.0 and Secure Boot.
title: Activision Knows Call of Duty Cheaters 'Will Try to Test the Limits' During the Black Ops 7 Beta, Says 'That's Exactly What We Want'

author: Tom Phillips
description: PlayStation fans are being advised to act now if they want to buy a PS5 Digital Edition 1TB console, as fresh stock quietly filters into Europe with a smaller SSD, despite the console being sold at the same price.
title: Sony is Quietly Introducing an Updated PlayStation 5 Digital Edition Console With Smaller SSD

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Superman got off to a flyer on HBO Max, with a whopping 13 million views in 10 days.
title: Superman Isn't Just HBO Max's Biggest Movie Launch Since Barbie, It Caused Streaming for All Things Superman — Including Zack Snyder's Man of Steel — to Spike

author: Vikki Blake
description: Terminator 2D: No Fate — the new retro game that blends scenes from Terminator 2: Judgment Day with original scenarios and multiple endings — has once again been delayed, this time to November 26, 2025. The reason? tariffs.
title: Terminator 2D: No Fate Delayed, Proving That Not Even Skynet Is Safe From Tariffs

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: PlayStation 5 exclusive Ghost of Yotei has a day-one patch that adds a number of important features to the game. Sony has provided IGN with the patch notes.
title: Sony Details Ghost of Yotei Day-One Patch Notes — Includes an Extensive List of Improvements

author: Michael Higham
description: By imitating the PS5's DualSense, Hyperkin made a solid wired-only Hall Effect controller for PC/Xbox with the Competitor, catered toward those who prefer symmetrical analog stick alignment.
title: Hyperkin Competitor Xbox and PC Controller Review – Sensing A Duel

author: Tristan Ogilvie
description: Creative, colourful, and a consistent crack up, Lego Party is purpose-built to turn any boring old night into a block party filled with belly laughs.
title: LEGO Party Review

author: Eric Song
description: It even comes with a built-in heatsink so you don't need to buy one and install it yourself.
title: PlayStation 5 SSDs Are Finally Dropping Back Down in Price, Like This 4TB Crucial P310 for $202

description: I’ve been stalking sales events long enough to know when the stars align, and today's haul is shaping up special.
title: AU Deals: Today's Bargain Buffet Serving JRPGs, Open Worlds, Hot Preorder Prices, and More!

author: Eric Song
description: This is a like-new, pristine condition certified refurbished model from Sonos direct.
title: Save 33% Off the Popular Sonos Era 100 Smart Speaker With Full 1-Year Sonos Warranty
